meanings.definition: Pandies (noun): A slang term for underwear.

meanings.sent3: He felt embarrassed when his pandies fell down in front of everyone.

meanings.sent5: The laundry room was full of colorful pandies hanging to dry.

meanings.definition: Pandies (verb): To hit or strike someone with force, typically with the hand.
meanings.sent1: He pandies his little brother when they play fight.
meanings.sent2: The boxer pandies his opponent with powerful punches.
